name: EL Media Global
overview:
EL Media Global (www.elmediaglobal.com) developed a white labeled solution for group buying, building on the concept that was pioneered by the Chicago-based Groupon.com. Today, it provides entrepreneurs and companies all around the world with one of the strongest group buying technologies in the market, constant web presence optimization, documentation of best practices, trainings and strategic advice.

EL Media Global is constantly seeking new opportunities to use its competitive advantage of enabling entrepreneurs and companies to enter into the rapidly growing group buying field in an extremely short period of time.

Current portfolio companies include:

  • Dealhayom.co.il (Israel) -> Round A seed funding completed as of July 2010
  • Twangoo.co.za (South Africa) -> South Africa Seedcamp 2010 finalist
  • Tuganguita.com (Mexico) -> Round A seed funding completed as of July 2010
  • Moykupon.ru (Russia)
  • Zanytude.com (France)

Interested entrepreneurs and companies can inquire a cooperation with EL Media Global to enter group buying via contact@elmediaglobal.com .
